title: The Writer's Almanac - Friday, August 6, 2021
description: It’s the birthday of Sir Alexander Fleming, born in Scotland in 1881. He was a bacteriologist and discovered the antibacterial properties of penicillin.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of Sir Alexander Fleming, born in Scotland in 1881. He was a bacteriologist and discovered the antibacterial properties of penicillin.
